gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 114, Spurs 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Zion Williamson finished a layup in transition with 03.8 left to give the Pelicans a 114-113 lead as they held on to defeat the Spurs. Zion Williamson (33 points, eight rebounds, four assists) and CJ McCollum (21 points, four rebounds, four assists) led the Pelicans as Devin Vassell (28 points, five 3PT), Victor Wembanyama (16 points, 14 rebounds, seven assists, three blocks), and Jeremy Sochan (15 points, career-high 16 rebounds) led the Spurs in the loss. New Orleans improves to 28-21 as the Spurs move to 10-39.
